title: Smoke and Sacrifice Update 1 READ NFO-SKIDROW
description:
S K I D R O W
the leading force

proudly presents
Smoke and Sacrifice Update 1

14-07-2018......Release Date <-> Protection.................Steam
RPG................Game Type <-> Disk(s)......................DOX

RELEASE NOTES

Read changelog.txt for information on the updated content!

Additional Notes:

Smoke.and.Sacrifice-SKIDROW

Are needed to install this release!

READ NFO NOTE:

Smoke.and.Sacrifice.Quality.of.Life-PLAZA came out the other day, and
while we haven't been "same day" releasing of all new updates to the
games we release - then PLAZA's release simply dosn't justify it. Yes
the game is in the small end, but PLAZA's 566mb release is NOT valid at
all

First of all, there is no Quality of Life DLC, nor does their release
offer any free campaign of any other game free content, that enhance
the game

Secondary, when you can update our totally valid release with a 3mb
update, then it's complete insanity to even accept theirs

Third thing that comes into our minds, rules - why do sites not nuke
their release? Why do we even have nukenets, when they don't qualify
to live up to the rulesets. Yes, we should have update those rules
long ago for several other reasons ;-)

Things can be changed, positions can be changed, competition can be
changed - let's help each other and change it for the better!

Quality over quantity!

Skid Row 2018

INSTALL NOTES

1. Unpack the release
2. Run Smoke.and.Sacrifice.Update.1.exe
3. Install into your gamefolder
4. Copy the cracked content from the SKIDROW folder and into the main
install folder and overwrite
5. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
secure/trusted in your antivirus program
6. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!
7. Remember to run game with admin rights - especially on drive C:
8. Play the game
9. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!

GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!

ascii art by the
godlike & terrific duo
malodix + irokos
titan artdivision
